name: ModuleBots
description:
Well I ended up only being able to implement half of the features before the jam deadline haha

Artist: Moss

Objective:

Destroy the 4 factories spawning enemy bots. They are indicated by the big red dots on your screen edges if you have a radar head equipped.

Controls:

WASD movement

E/F to loot bot module of dead bots

R to scavenge dead bot for health instead

Mouse to aim

Left click/Right Click: Use left arm/right arm module
